title: 20mm Mini Travel Mahjong Set with Majiang Table Travel Board Game Chinese Traditional Mahjong Games, Portable Size and Light-Weight
features: Portable Design: the size of a single mahjong is about 20 x 18 x 11mm (0.78 x 0.71 x 0.43 inch) , the size of mahjong case is about 4.17 x 7.48 x 1.57 inches, and the table is foldable and portable, you can bring this whether at home or on a trip, or other occasions, which provides more choices for your amusement

The Packaging Includes: you will get 1 piece of foldable flannel mahjong table, 144 pieces of Chinese mahjong, 2 pieces of spare mahjong, 1 piece of blackjack drawing, 1 piece of tai-sai drawing, and 1 piece of hoo hey how drawing, 3 pieces of regular dices, 3 pieces of fish-prawn-crab dices, 1 piece of drinking dice, and 1 set of playing cards, which provide a complete set to bring a wonderful gaming experience

Chinese Elements: mahjong travel game set is a standard Chinese game, and does not contain clown cards and numbers, only including pure original characters and images applied in traditional Chinese mahjong card art, such as 144 patterns, 36 circles, 36 bamboos, 36 characters, 12 dragons (red, green, white), 16 winds (N, E, S), 8 flowers and seasons); At the same time, the attached drawings can give more ways to play, which is very worthwhile

Quality Material: Chinese traditional mahjong game set is made of quality materials and equipped with 3D color patterns, which has clear printing technology and fine workmanship so that you can easily see the patterns on it; Besides, it is not easy to fade and break, washable, and you can use it for a long time

Wide Application: no venue, no table, when you want to play, just open the mini mahjong set and play on the spot, and there are mahjong, card, or dice games for you to choose, which is suitable for birthday parties, travel, and other different occasions
description: Features:Ideal gift:Mini travel mahjong set with majiang table is the ideal choice as a party game, and you can send it as a gift, which will be an excellent and unforgettable gift for people at parties, and they can have a happy and laughing time with mahjong game set.Easy to play:Mini dominoes set kit is easy to play and suitable for many theme parties, such as birthday parties, weddings, activities, which can relieve the awkward atmosphere of the party.Specifications:Single mahjong size: 20 x 18 x 11mm (0.78 x 0.71 x 0.43 inch)Mahjong Case Size: 4.17 x 7.48 x 1.57 inchesColor: as pictures showPackage includes:1 Set of mini travel mahjong with majiang tableNotes:Manual measurement, please allow slight errors on size.The color may exist slight difference due to different screen displays.
